section.title: Available functions
section.para: This module provides access to a limited number of OpenSIPS core functions.

section.title: xdbg(message)
section.para: An alias for xlog(DBG, message)

section.title: xlog([level],message)
section.para:
Logs the message with OpenSIPS's logging facility. The logging level is one of the following:
ALERT
CRIT
ERR
WARN
NOTICE
INFO
DBG

section.title: setUserDebug
section.para: Enable or disable the xlog feature. Disabled, the xlog function has no effect.

section.title: WarnMissingFreeFixup
section.para: Dynamically change the variable warn_missing_free_fixup.

section.title: getpid
section.para: Returns the current pid.

section.title: getmem
section.para: Returns a table with the size of allocated memory and the fragmentation.

section.title: getmeminfo
section.para: Returns a table with memory infos.

section.title: gethostname
section.para: Returns the value of the current hostname.

section.title: getType(msg)
section.para: Returns "SIP_REQUEST" or "SIP_REPLY".

section.title: getURI_User(msg)
section.para: Returns the user of the To URI.

section.title: getExpires(msg)
section.para: Returns the expires header of the current message.

section.title: getHeader(header)
section.para: Returns the value of the specified header.

section.title: getContact(msg)
section.para: Returns a table with the contact header.

section.title: moduleFunc(msg, function, args1, args2)
section.para: You can pass arguments to this function.

section.title: getStatus(msg)
section.para: Returns the current status if the SIP message is a SIP_REPLY.

section.title: getMethod(msg)
section.para: Returns the current method.

section.title: getSrcIp(msg)
section.para: Returns the IP address of the source.

section.title: getDstIp(msg)
section.para: Returns the IP address of the destination.

section.title: AVP_get(msg, name)
section.para: Returns an AVP variable.

section.title: AVP_set(msg, name, value)
section.para: Defines an AVP variable.

section.title: AVP_destroy(msg, name)
section.para: Destroys an AVP variable.

section.title: pseudoVar(msg, variable)
section.para: Returns a pseudoVar.

section.title: add_lump_rpl
section.para: Add header to the reply.
